sections.heading: Overview
content: Shruthi N, MD, attended Jagadguru Sri Shivarathreeshwara Medical College, Mysore, India, in 2013, earning her bachelor’s degree in medicine and surgery (MBBS), followed by her master’s degree in microbiology (MD) from Employees' State Insurance Corporation Medical College, Bangalore, India, in 2018.

She is an infectious disease physician skilled at understanding the infectious nature of diseases and diagnostic reporting of various microbiological laboratory tests. Before joining WebMD, she worked at multinational companies like IQVIA, Parexel, and TCS as a medical reviewer and drug safety physician. Her special interests include advocating and upholding universal human rights and mental health.
In her spare time, she likes to read, write, paint, and garden.
